means: （长时间地）忍受，忍耐，容忍( endure的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He also talked briefly about the isolation he endured while in captivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还简单谈及了他被俘期间忍受的孤独。

sentence.Network_en: He endured excruciating ago-nies before he finally expired.
sentence.Network_cn: 在最终离世前他经受了极大的痛苦。

sentence.Network_en: The islanders endured centuries of exploitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个岛上的居民忍受了数个世纪的剥削。

PerfectNetExp.abs: she has endured great pain for several years ., 几年来她忍受着极大的痛苦.
for us , they toiled in sweatshops and settled the West ; endured the lash of the whip and plowed the hard earth .为了我们，他们开拓西部，在条件恶劣的工厂中流血流汗；他们忍受鞭笞，开垦贫瘠的土地。
忍耐；容忍 vi. 持续，持久；忍耐endured adj. 吃苦耐劳的v. （长时间地）忍受，忍耐，容忍( endure的过去式和过去分词 )；持续，持久，坚持下去.
" Human life is everywhere a state in which much is to be endured and little to be enjoyed " ( Samuel Johnson ) .“无论在何处，人类生活总是忍受的苦难多，享受的欢乐少”（塞缪尔·约翰逊）。

list.abs: 健康幸福贪婪恐惧 - Nut.Berry - 网易博客 ... dexterity 敏捷 endurance 耐力 enegry 能量.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... endure v 持久，耐久 endurance n 忍耐力 indurate v 使坚硬，使坚固.
烈空坐_百度百科 ... 投掷 Fling 忍耐（endure） Endure 龙之波动 Dragon Pulse.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... confess 坦白 endure 忍受 contemplate 细想.
建筑专业英语词汇(E) ... endurance strength 耐久强度 endurance test 疲劳试验 endurance testing machine 疲劳试验机.

entry.def: If you endure a painful or difficult situation, you experience it and do not avoid it or give up, usually because you cannot.

example.ex: The company endured heavy financial losses.
example.tran: 那家公司遭受了严重亏损。

example.ex: ...unbearable pain, which they had to endure in solitude because not even the doctors could get near them.
example.tran: 他们不得不独自承受的无法忍受的疼痛，因为甚至连医生都无法靠近他们

entry.def: If something endures, it continues to exist without any loss in quality or importance.

example.ex: Somehow the language endures and continues to survive.
example.tran: 那种语言以某种方式保存下来，并继续存在下去。

auth_sentence.content: Still, some Saxon borrowers have endured long waits.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, some Saxon borrowers have endured long waits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, some Saxon borrowers have endured long waits.

auth_sentence.content: This great nation will endure as it has endured.
auth_sentence.res_content: This great nation will endure as it has endured.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This great nation will endure as it has endured.

auth_sentence.content: Nokia World attendees endured something of a rude awakening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nokia World attendees endured something of a rude awakening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nokia World attendees endured something of a rude awakening.
